column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After several trips to Houston
column2: it took me up until the 3rd visit to finally come to Jinya. This place was hyped up by all of my friends with good reason. First off
column3: the service was exceptional and efficient. Our server took good care of us especially as first timers. What impressed me the most was how fast our food came out. I had placed an order for the brussel sprouts as an appetizer and didn't even finish half of it before our ramen came out.
